snippet.title: Conoce al robot guitarrista de 78 dedos
snippet.description:
* Por Sheena McKenzie, para CNN (CNN) – Pregunta rápida de matemáticas: ¿Qué tiene 78 dedos, 22 brazos y ningún cerebro? Respuesta: "Z-Machines", la banda robótica con un sorprendente sonido humano. Si estás viendo esta nota en tu móvil, mira aquí la...
http://cnnespanol.cnn.com/2014/03/14/conoce-al-robot-guitarrista-de-78-dedos/

snippet.title: Meet the robot guitarist with 78 fingers and coolest cable hair you've ever seen
snippet.description:
* Quick math question: What has 78 fingers, 22 arms, and no brain?
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/14/tech/meet-the-robot-guitarist/index.html

snippet.title: NYC cabbie accused of dodging $28,000 in tolls
snippet.description:
* A New York City taxi driver is charged with keeping more than $28,000 that should have gone to the Metropolitan Transit Authority in E-Z Pass toll fees over the past two years.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/20/us/new-york-cabbie-tolls/index.html

snippet.title: Did Christians really 'steal' Easter?
snippet.description:
* Opinion by Candida Moss, special to CNN (CNN) - It’s that time of year again: the time when chocolate comes in pastels, cherry blossoms start to bloom and well-marketed religion exposés are released to the world. In other words, it’s Easter. Among the...
http://religion.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/17/did-christians-really-steal-easter/

snippet.title: This machine makes drinking water from thin air
snippet.description:
* Water. A vital nutrient, yet one that is inaccessible to many worldwide.
